com.emc.rogetmf.webfs.actions

Class QueryDqlObjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.rogetmf.webfs.action.AbstractCallbackAction
      • com.emc.rogetmf.webfs.actions.QueryDqlObjectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.emc.d2fs.dctm.plugin.IPluginAction

    public class QueryDqlObjectService
extends AbstractCallbackAction
    Providing method used to run Public Search and Quick search based on FreeMarker DQL templates.
    Author:
    Krzysztof Jurkowski
    See Also:
    QueryDqlObjectWebfsService

      • initQueryDqlObject

        public java.util.List<com.emc.d2fs.models.attribute.Attribute> initQueryDqlObject(com.emc.d2fs.dctm.web.services.D2fsContext context)
                                                                           throws com.documentum.fc.common.DfException,
                                                                                  com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException,
                                                                                  com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException
        Initializes Public Search helper object with a DQL template stored in a given Query form object. This method must be called prior to executing a public search.
        Parameters:
        context - Should contain r_object_id of the Query form containing FreeMarker DQL template for the search.
        Returns:
        Object ID of the initialized D2cQueryDql object.
        Throws:
        com.documentum.fc.common.DfException
        com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException
        com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException

      • getQueryDqlObject

        public java.util.List<com.emc.d2fs.models.attribute.Attribute> getQueryDqlObject(com.emc.d2fs.dctm.web.services.D2fsContext context)
                                                                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                                                 com.documentum.fc.common.DfException,
                                                                                 com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException,
                                                                                 com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException
        Returns Object ID of the Public Search helper object which DQL template has been evaluated with the parameters passed by the session user. This object can be used to execute a Public search with the D2_ACTION_SEARCH_DOCUMENT action.
        Parameters:
        context - Should contain r_object_id of the Query form containing FreeMarker DQL template for the search.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        com.documentum.fc.common.DfException
        com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException
        com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException

                                                                                         com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException
        Returns Object ID of the Public Search helper object which DQL template has been evaluated with the parameters passed by the session user. This object can be used to execute a Public search with the D2_ACTION_SEARCH_DOCUMENT action.
        Parameters:
        context - Should contain r_object_id of the Query form containing FreeMarker DQL template for the search.

        Throws:

        com.documentum.fc.common.DfException

      • getQueryDqlObjectForQuickSearch

        public java.util.List<com.emc.d2fs.models.attribute.Attribute> getQueryDqlObjectForQuickSearch(com.emc.d2fs.dctm.web.services.D2fsContext context)
                                                                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                                                               com.documentum.fc.common.DfException,
                                                                                               com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException,
                                                                                               com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException
        Returns Object ID of the Quick Search helper object. It requires a ROG_QUICK_SEARCH Query form stored in the repository. The query form must contain a FreeMarker DQL template of the DQL executed by the Quick search. The DQL template is evaluated with the Quick search term passed by the session user. This object can be used to execute a Public search with the D2_ACTION_SEARCH_DOCUMENT action.
        Parameters:
        context - Should contain quick_search_term parameter with the value of search phrase passed by the user
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        com.documentum.fc.common.DfException
        com.emc.d2fs.exceptions.D2fsException
        com.emc.common.java.utils.ArgumentNotFoundException
